member.name: ISurrogateService.ApplicationFree
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is S_OK. Otherwise, it is E_UNEXPECTED.

member.name: ISurrogateService.ApplicationLaunch
member.param: The application type, as described in Remarks.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is S_OK. Otherwise, it is E_UNEXPECTED.

member.name: ISurrogateService.CatalogRefresh
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is S_OK. Otherwise, it is E_UNEXPECTED.

member.name: ISurrogateService.Init
member.param: The process ID of the server application.
A pointer to an instance of the interface.
Indicates whether the application is aware of the initialization.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is S_OK. Otherwise, it is E_UNEXPECTED.

member.name: ISurrogateService.ProcessShutdown
member.param: The shutdown type, as described in Remarks.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, the return value is S_OK. Otherwise, it is E_UNEXPECTED.
